title: How Do You Hyperlink on Canva — A Quick Guide

steps.title: Open a design in Canva.
steps.content: Open a design in Canva. You can either create a new design, or open an existing one. Items will retain their hyperlink when you present the design, or download it as a PDF. [1] X Research source If you’re just getting started or want some refreshers, check out our guides on learning graphic design and learning web design .

steps.title: Click or tap the item you want to hyperlink.
steps.content: Click or tap the item you want to hyperlink. You can make text, images, elements, and videos into clickable links. [2] X Research source You can make just part of text a hyperlink by double-clicking the text and highlighting where you want to add the link.

steps.title: Click or tap the link button.
steps.content: Click or tap the link button. It’s the icon with a chain link in the editor toolbar. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Type the link.
steps.content: Type the link. Type or paste the website you want to link to in the pop-up window. You can also link to another page in the design document, or to a recent design. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Press Enter.
steps.content: Press Enter. Use the Enter button on your keyboard to confirm the hyperlink. On mobile, tap Apply or Done to confirm the link. If you’re downloading the design, there are a few things to know about hyperlinks: [5] X Research source Downloading as a PDF allows hyperlinks to remain functional. Image files (such as JPG) don’t support hyperlinks. Social media (like LinkedIn) don’t support hyperlinks (on posts or PDFs).
